section.title: Preconfiguring with Managed IT Packages
section.para: These packages are made with builds of Diablo with backported fixes. They are intended for use on Ubuntu 11.10, Oneiric, and provided by Managed IT.
First, ensure you have python-software-properties installed, and then you need to add the repository:
section.literallayout: sudo apt-get install python-software-properties sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:managedit/openstack
